entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
